resources.string: Capture live video and audio streaming from your smartphone with Spydroid
Turn the wifi on and join a network !
Here you can play streams from another smartphone running Spydroid. Both smartphones obvioulsy have to be connected to the same wireless network !
Spydroid is a fun and open source application !
If you don\'t understand how to use it, the google page of project is here to help you out. For instance, it contains valuable information about how to catch the stream directly from VLC
Don\'t forget to rate the app, it\'s really important, your life depends on it !
You might also like it on facebook, why not ? Come on, like it ! It will be our little secret
Help me to translate Spydroid in other languages ! If you are willing to help me in this crazy quest, send me a mail :)
